abilities.name: Spiral
abilities.effect: As long as Poliwrath is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Confused Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Split Spiral Punch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Mega Throw
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Pokémon-ex, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.
